QuestData.Title: Round 1, Fight!
QuestData.Description:
All of my gladiators are out of commission!
It's down to you, $n. Bilgerudder's going to pit his three champions against you.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Survive the arena until you eliminate Boss Whalebelly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Have Sternfathom throw you into the arena, defeat Boss Whalebelly, and then find Okuna Longtusk inside Oceanus Cove.
QuestData.RewardText: <This is where you expected to find Okuna. Instead, you only found the pack with the weapons.>
